config.mahjongcraft.title: MahjongCraft Options
config.mahjongcraft.tooltip.auto_reset: Will automatically reset at the end of each round
config.mahjongcraft.tooltip.hud_position: §eYou can open the HUD Position Editor by §akey binding (%s§a)§e to edit the position of the HUD
config.mahjongcraft.tooltip.yaku_overvie: §eYou can open Yaku Overview Screen by §akey binding (%s§a)§e
mahjongcraft.game.min_points_to_win.desc: At ALL LAST,if the 1st-ranked player has less points than this value,the game will extend into South/West Round
mahjongcraft.game.round.title: %s %d
mahjongcraft.game.message.already_in_a_g: You are already in a game
mahjongcraft.game.message.be_kick: You were kicked by the game host
mahjongcraft.game.message.host_changed_t: The host has changed the rules, please review the rules again and get ready for the game
mahjongcraft.game.message.player_is_not_: Player %s is NOT in this world
mahjongcraft.gui.tooltip.clickable.when_: Clickable when all players are ready
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.riichi.de: Win a hand after you declared Riichi; You may declare Riichi when you achieve Tenpai (ready hand) at Menzenchin (closed hand)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.tanyao.de: Win a hand without any Terminal Tiles (1-Man/9-Man, 1-Pin/9-Pin, 1-Sou/9-Sou, Wind Tiles, and Dragon Tiles)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.tsumo.des: Win a hand by Tsumo (drawing the winning tile) at Menzenchin (closed hand)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.jikaze.de: Win a hand with a Triplet of Player Wind
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.bakaze.de: Win a hand with a Triplet of Round Wind
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.sangen.de: Win a hand with a Triplet of Dragon Tile (White, Green or Red)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.pinfu.des: Win a hand with four Sequences and one non-Yakuhai Pair, plus the potential winning tiles must be tiles from both side of a Sequence
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.ipeiko.de: Win a hand with two identical Sequences
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.chankan.d: Call a Ron (declare winning) on another player's Kan (when you have a Tenpai for Thirteen Orphans,you can call on a closed kan)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.rinshanka: Win a hand with the tile drawn from the Dead Wall after immediately calling a Kan
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.haitei.de: Win a hand by Tsumo (drawing the winning tile) with the last tile drawn from the Wall
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.houtei.de: Win a hand by calling Ron (declare winning) on the last discarded tile
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.ippatsu.d: Win a hand within 1 turn after declaring Riichi, in addition, draws/discards must not be interrupted by tile calls during that turn
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.dora.desc: The next tile immediately after the flipped Dora Indicator Tile
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.double_re: Declare Riichi with your starting hand before any tiles are called
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.sanshokud: Win a hand with three Triplets with the same number out of the Number Tiles (Man, Pin, Sou)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.sankantsu: Win a hand with three Quads
Win a hand with four Triplets or Quads
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.sananko.d: Win a hand with three closed Triplets or closed Quads
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.shosangen: Win a hand with two Triplets out of the Dragon Tiles (White, Green or Red), plus a Pair of the third Dragon Tile
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.honrohtoh: Win a hand with only Terminal Tiles (1-Man/9-Man, 1-Pin/9-Pin, 1-Sou/9-Sou, Wind Tiles, and Dragon Tiles)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.chitoitsu: Win a hand with seven different Pairs
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.chanta.de: Win a hand where every Sequence, Triplet and Pair contains at least one Terminal Tile
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.ikkitsuka: Win a hand with a complete Sequence of 1 through 9 (i.e. 123-Man, 456-Man, 789-Man)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.sanshokud: Win a hand with three Sequences with the same numbers out of three different Number Tiles (i.e. 123-Man, 123-Pin, 123-Sou)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.ryanpeiko: Win a hand with two sets two identical Sequences
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.junchan.d: Win a hand with every Sequence, Triplet and Pair contains at least one 1 and 9 out of the Number Tiles (1-Man/9-Man, 1-Pin/9-Pin, 1-Sou/9-Sou)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.honitsu.d: Win a hand with tiles from only one of the three Number Tiles (Man, Pin or Sou) and HonorTiles (Wind Tiles and Dragon Tiles)
Win a hand with tiles from only one of the three Number Tiles (Man, Pin or Sou)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.nagashi_m: Win a game with all your discarded tiles being Terminal Tiles, and no one has called them
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.tenho.des: Win a hand by Tsumo as a dealer in the first turn with the first draw
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.chiho.des: Win a hand by Tsumo as a non-dealer in the first turn before any tiles are called
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.daisangen: Win a hand with three Triplets or Quads of all the three Dragon Tiles
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.suanko.de: Win a hand with four closed Triplets
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.tsuiso.de: Win a hand with four Triplets and a Pair of the Honor Tiles (Wind Tiles and Dragon Tiles)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.ryuiso.de: Win a hand with only green-colored tiles: 2-Sou/3-Sou/4-Sou/6-Sou/8-Sou and/or Green
Win a hand with four Triplets and a Pair of 1 and 9 out of the Number Tiles (1-Man/9-Man, 1-Pin/9-Pin, 1-Sou/9-Sou)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.kokushimu: Win a hand with one of each 13 Terminal Tiles, plus any tile matches one of them
Win a hand with three Triplets or Quads of the Wind Tiles, plus a pair of the fourth wind
Win a hand with four Quads
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.churenpoh: Win a hand with tiles from only one of the three Number Tiles in the order of "1112345678999", plus any tile matches one of them
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.suanko_ta: Achieve Tenpai with four Closed Triplets already drawn (i.e. waiting for one remaining tile to form a Pair)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.kokushimu: Achieve Tenpai with 13 different Terminal Tiles already drawn (i.e. waiting for 1 out of 13 possible tiles to win)
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.junsei_ch: Achieve Tenpai with tiles from only one of the three Number Tiles in the order of “1112345678999” (i.e. waiting for 1 out of 9 possible tiles to win)
Win a hand with four Triplets or Quads of the Wind Tiles
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.suufon_re: The game becomes a draw when each player discards the same Wind Tile in the first turn
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.suukaikan: The game becomes a draw when two or more players called for a total of four Quads
mahjongcraft.gui.yaku_overview.suucha_ri: The game becomes a draw when all players have declared Riichi
